entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

Observed at: University of Victoria 04:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind light except west 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait this morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
